abstract: Significant investments in marketing of crucial brands like Pepsi and Lay’s and strong sales in Latin America and other emerging markets also helped the company.
snippet: Significant investments in marketing of crucial brands like Pepsi and Lay’s and strong sales in Latin America and other emerging markets also helped the company.
lead_paragraph: Investors in PepsiCo saw glimmers of the end of the tunnel on Thursday when the company reported a 17 percent increase in fourth-quarter profit after a long lackluster performance.

headline.main: Higher Prices Help PepsiCo to a 17% Gain in Profit
headline.print_headline: Higher Prices Help PepsiCo Post a 17% Profit Increase
